long_description: To multiply a scalar, use the MULTIPLY node.
short_description: The DOT_PRODUCT node takes two input matrices, multiplies them (by dot product), and returns the result.

parameters.name: a
parameters.description: The input matrix to be multiplied to input b.

parameters.name: b
parameters.description: The input matrix to be multiplied to input a.

returns.description: The matrix result from the matrix multiplication.
